TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509Store extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class X509Store Implements IDisposable
public ref class X509Store sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 X.509 存储，该存储是保留和管理证书的物理存储。

span.span: Represents an X.509 store, which is a physical store where certificates are persisted and managed.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类处理 x.509 存储。Use this class to work with an X.509 store. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]开始，此类型实现 接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] 和更早版本的应用程序， 类不实现 接口，因此没有 `Dispose` 方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何打开标准 x.509 存储，并列出每个存储中的证书数量。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储区。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将打印摘要，其中显示每个存储是否存在，如果存在，则显示它包含的证书的数量。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例为标准名称和标准位置的每个组合创建一个 对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它通过 标志调用 方法，该标志仅在已存在的情况下打开物理存储区。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果物理存储存在，则该示例使用 、和 属性来显示存储中的证书数量。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例2****Example 2** 此示例将打开一个 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用当前用户的个人证书存储来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the personal certificates store of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建 对象，该对象使用当前用户的个人 x.509 证书存储区。Use this constructor to create an object using the personal X.509 certificate store for the current user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数提供与非托管的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）的兼容性。Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 有关 `HCERTSTORE` 句柄的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管 CAPI 文档。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建 对象，并指定存储位置，该位置是当前用户或本地计算机的位置。Use this constructor to create an object, specifying the store location, which is either the location for the current user or the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. span.span: Adds a collection of certificates to an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将多个证书添加到 x.509 证书存储区;如果一个证书添加失败，则会恢复操作，并且不会添加任何证书。This method adds more than one certificate to an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate addition fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. summary.span: 返回位于 X.509 证书存储中的证书集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of certificates located in an X.509 certificate store.
A collection of certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回 x.509 证书存储的快照。This method returns a snapshot of the X.509 certificate store. 请注意，在存储区上执行的后续 或 操作对返回的集合不会有任何影响。Note that subsequent or operations performed on the store will not have any effect on the collection that is returned. 此快照将在每次调用属性时重新计算，因此不建议在迭代函数内使用此属性。This snapshot is recalculated each time the property is called, so the use of this property inside an iterative function is not recommended. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何打开标准 x.509 存储，并列出每个存储中的证书数量。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储区。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将打印摘要，其中显示每个存储是否存在，如果存在，则显示它包含的证书的数量。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例为标准名称和标准位置的每个组合创建一个 对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它通过 标志调用 方法，该标志仅在已存在的情况下打开物理存储区。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果物理存储存在，则该示例使用 、和 属性来显示存储中的证书数量。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例2****Example 2** 此示例将打开一个 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 X.509 证书存储。

span.span: Closes an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法释放与存储区关联的所有资源。This method releases all resources associated with the store. 使用后，应始终关闭 x.509 证书存储。You should always close an X.509 certificate store after use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回当前用户的存储或本地计算机的存储的 x.509 证书存储位置。This property returns the X.509 certificate store location of either the store for the current user or the store for the local computer. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何打开标准 x.509 存储，并列出每个存储中的证书数量。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储区。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将打印摘要，其中显示每个存储是否存在，如果存在，则显示它包含的证书的数量。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例为标准名称和标准位置的每个组合创建一个 对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它通过 标志调用 方法，该标志仅在已存在的情况下打开物理存储区。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果物理存储存在，则该示例使用 、和 属性来显示存储中的证书数量。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例2****Example 2** 此示例将打开一个 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 x.509 证书存储区名称。This property returns the X.509 certificate store name. 此值可以指示存储的证书类型，例如根证书或来自受信任发布者的证书。This value can indicate the type of certificates stored, such as root certificates or certificates from trusted publishers. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何打开标准 x.509 存储，并列出每个存储中的证书数量。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书范围。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **示例1****Example 1** 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储区。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它将打印摘要，其中显示每个存储是否存在，如果存在，则显示它包含的证书的数量。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 该示例为标准名称和标准位置的每个组合创建一个 对象。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它通过 标志调用 方法，该标志仅在已存在的情况下打开物理存储区。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果物理存储存在，则该示例使用 、和 属性来显示存储中的证书数量。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **示例2****Example 2** 此示例将打开一个 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

param.name: flags
param.span: 一个枚举值的按位组合，它指定 X.509 证书存储的打开方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 根据 标志设置，打开 X.509 证书存储或创建一个新存储。

span.span: Opens an X.509 certificate store or creates a new store, depending on flag settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以打开现有的 x.509 存储。Use this method to open an existing X.509 store. 请注意，你必须有 指定的附加权限，以枚举存储中的证书。Note that you must have additional permissions, specified by , to enumerate the certificates in the store. 可以通过将不存在的存储名称传递给类构造函数，然后使用除 以外的任何 标志来创建新的存储区。You can create a new store by passing a store name that does not exist to the class constructor, and then using any of the flags except . ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以从 x.509 存储中删除单个证书。Use this method to remove a single certificate from an X.509 store. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. span.span: Removes a range of certificates from an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 此方法从 x.509 证书存储中删除多个证书;如果一个证书删除失败，则会恢复该操作，并且不会删除任何证书。This method removes more than one certificate from an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate removal fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 x.509 证书存储区，添加并删除证书，然后关闭存储区。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定你有三个要在本地存储区中添加和删除的证书。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可提供与非托管的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）的兼容性。Use the property to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 有关 `HCERTSTORE` 句柄的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管 CAPI 文档。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

span.span: The store is not open.
for unmanaged code.
